channel.title: Basing New NKs on already-existing abilities
channel.description:
I'm going to pretend a new NK is a real possibility and try to classify (very succinctly) the style of the current 3 NKs and then try to identify some new styles which could inspire a new NK:
- Identity Theft & Remote Control (Possessor) - Time Bomb (Sorcerer) - Dead seem alive / Alive seem dead (Reaper - referring to reap and chill)
There is of course the Plaguebearer concept also:
- Contagious Infection (Plaguebearer)
Werewolf, Serial Killer, and Arsonist styles are merged with previously listed classes.
Here is a list of what I believe are attacks which one could base an entire NK around:
- Butler Poison - Old Merc's Rebound (could take revenge upon anyone who prevents you also) - Extortion (privately notify a player they will die unless they perform a certain action) - Snare Trap (victim dies if they do anything tonight, but aren't warned beforehand) - Hunter's Arrow (entwine the fate of two players, if one dies or is executed, the other dies also) - I might update this list
I think a new NK would be cool, actually I always like when new classes are introduced.
